value:
$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|On your guard, Fjorm. Múspell has
revealed himself.$k$pAnd with him, his champion...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...P-Princess Laegjarn?! But you—$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hello, Fjorm.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm, use my power to defeat her.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...I can't!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Kill Nifl's defender, dog.$k$pAs long as I have you under my
control, you have no choice but
to do as I command.$k$pI hope you understand that
by now.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Hrrk! I...I rrr—$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Forgive me, Lady Nifl, but I cannot
bring myself to fight her...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fight or die. She is under Múspell's
curse and cannot resist his command.$k$pUntil she is released from Múspell's
control, she has no choice but to do
as he bids.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... But then...$k$pPrincess Laegjarn, please listen!
I have no wish to fight you.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Forgive me, Princess Fjorm.$k$p$EFace|I cannot...resist him... I won't be able
to stop myself. I am unable even to
take my own life.  I must kill you.$k$pYou have to fight me, Fjorm...
You have to kill me.$k$pIf you don't, I will be forced to
kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! There must be some other way.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I had the same hope, but...$k$pI could see no way for us to both
survive this...$k$pOne of us has to die.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But I—$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Ready yourself, Fjorm!$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|"Two gods war, their champions
spill blood...$k$p"Ice melts while the flame remains...$k$p"Pierced by frost, the Flame Gem
rekindles, the champion renewed."$k$pThe prophesy of the Twilit Runes
is unerring fate... Things will end
just as Múspell claimed.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course it will.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Yes, well... If you ask me, fate playing
out exactly as planned is a bit on the
dull side. Wouldn't you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...It is not our place to question
Alfaðör's design.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$EFace_Smile|What would you say to making
a little wager—between the two
of us?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|On what?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Who will win, of course. Ice or flame.$k$pThe courage to wager everything
is surely something someone like
you can respect.$k$p$EFace_Smile|So...whoever loses will have to do
whatever the winner asks, no matter
what it is. What do you say?$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...The future is decided. Why would
either of us bet on the losing side?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|For fun, of course!$k$pHmmm... What should I make you
do when I win?$k$pEven considering the possibilities
is its own sort of joy.$k$pWhat would be the best way to
embarrass an overserious war god...
Let me think...$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Cease your scheming, Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, merely hypotheticals...$k$pYou know, Thórr, there are countless
other worlds. That means countless
ways for it to end.$k$pBut do hurry... You'll need to make
your wager before the results come
in, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|...Fine. We will play your game.$k$pI will choose...$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi3000|HYAH!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh!$k$pPlease... Princess Laegjarn...
You have to stop yourself!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|There is nothing I can do. You must
kill me before I can kill you!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Yes, that's it! Good! Fight harder!
HARDER! Sic her, dog!$k$pPin her down! Take her neck in your
mouth like the prey she is—and rip
out her windpipe!$k$pGyah-hahahaha!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Nyah!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm. Use your weapon. Fight.$k$pPut away your fear. You want to
survive, do you not?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Of course! But if I have to kill
Princess Laegjarn to do so...
I just...$k$pPlease, $Nu...
Help me...$k$pWhat do I do?!$k$p
